::Zardus/DevilDuer/FZ::

Zardus nods, standing up. "I may have a mission for you, yes. Wait here, I have to go see about something."

He walks out of the room, replying to the Infecticon transmission: "This is Zardus, Alliance commander. I am indeed interested. Where can we meet?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer simply remains silent, sitting in the cargo bay.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ nods. "I see." He looks at Lady Hawk. "Just how great is the intellect and instincts of these alien donors?"
